txt.en: 'This information will be useful to avoid Nêpharai in this area.'
Scout the northern and western entrances to Harkhaphâr.
Return to Bâkhadir located just north of Harkhaphâr and return with your scouting report.
To the south, the Nêpharai have made a small encampment known as Harkhaphâr. Scout out the north and west approaches to Harkhaphâr and report any additional threats.

'The Nêpharai have begun to build out their settlement in Harkhaphâr. There are two main entrances to the camp, one from the northern side of the camp and one to the western side. We must look for weaknesses in their defences so that we might be able to strike at this camp again if need be.\n\n'Scout out each of these entrances, and report back with your findings.'
Talk to Bâkhadir outside of the camp
